reviewText: Packaging is great and it was a very awesome deal.

This is my favorite show, which I give a hearty 100% to, but not to this Blu Ray set.. While the video quality is great, seasons 3 and 4 have a weird menu compared to the other seasons, which doesn't allow you to pick an episode, but forces you to fastforward through previous episodes to get to the one you want. They only display a "Special Features" menu or "Play All". Season 4 also cut out the "Then" sequences so I couldn't watch the finale recap ruining my tradition. Sure I can listen to "Carry On Wayward Son" anytime, but it still took away from the experience... :( Might have to buy 3 and 4 separate in order to skip being annoyed.
This is a misleading title. The series isn't over yet. Hence not the "complete" series
Really great dvds
One of my favorite series.
Awesome
Love it

Slightly earlier than the last time, this new UK box set of Seasons 1-10 of the splendid SUPERNATURAL series is finally available. Previous box set was released last June, so, this new one arrives a little early, though late compared to the US one. Late but great, however, as buyers of these sets are compensated by the high quality in all aspects. The packaging is stunning, with all 10 standard, clear blue amaray cases housed in a glossy, sturdy slide-off box set, featuring all 218 episodes, plus special features. Each Season contains the Episodes and bonus features from the separate blu-ray Season releases (except for Easter eggs and some image galleries), and comes with an inside booklet listing credits and summaries. A compact, comprehensive and stylish box set, absolutely worth buying. Whether a fan, a casual viewer of the show or a collector, this is a flawless item absolutely worth buying. Here are the contents analytically:

Note: The aspect ratio in all Seasons is 1.78:1. Japanese audio is only available when player menu language is Japanese. The box set's total run time is 9,222 minutes.

SEASON 1

Subtitles: English SDH, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish

Run time: 946 minutes

as i start season 10,i must say it has been a fun ride with the Winchester Brothers in the back seat of Dean's Impala "Baby"
The first few seasons had them fighting mostly Demons,Monsters and then some. Now,towards the end it's about heaven and hell and the battle between Angels & Demons. Some exciting and funny episodes in between.
Crowley,the king of Hell is fun and Cas,their Angel friend has been with them a while now.
great fun!

nan

Standard box set, my only complaint is there is no room for the next seasons.

As for the show it's a fun monster of the week show that developed a deeper plot. Campy and fun.
No issues with product, but delivery was late. Still a great price even if I had t wait.

Despite the description that says this collection is only 10 discs, it is actually 10 blu-ray packages of 4 discs a piece! And, as stated in the description, it is Region Free. AWESOME value for an AWESOME show! Highly recommend picking this up!
It came on time and satisfied with project
I have had no problems playing this on my American PS3. All of the DVDs work to my knowledge and the packaging was in great condition.
Wonderful set, wonderful price, fast shipping.  Everything I hoped for!

This is all just on the first disc, can't wait to see what else is wrong :/

Great tv collection for the money, the only reason I'm giving 4* is BC some of the seasons will not work with the Blu-ray players memory system to remember your spot you stopped. Other than that, same shows as American for the money!

All of the first ten seasons of an awesome show. I never get tired if watching it. Overall it came down to about $9 per season in this pack. That's for Blu Ray too. That's a very hard price to beat, and with Amazon Prime, free shipping.
The video quality is perfect but unfortunately my season four came whit out Spanish subtitles.  I'm so sad because is my favorite season.
Season 6 forward,  the disc would not start where stopped, had to start from the beginning each time the disc was stopped.
Big fan of supernatural
We like the show wanted to add to my wife's collection
It was birthday gift for my daughter. She loves it.
Excellent quality. It's great to see the old episodes in high quality blu-ray. Finest in Mullet-head rock.
great edition to my collection

Amazing "complete" series. Well, not entirely complete since the show goes past 10 seasons, but as far as this item is concerned it is complete. The quality of audio and video for the seasons are so far great (on third season). The show itself is amazing.

This box is amazing. It came in days before the expected delivery date and everything was in perfect condition. I love keeping my discs in the box, helps me stay so organised. Thanks to this and my order for season 11, I'm all ready to go for season 12 next month.

I chanced across the series recently due to looking for the work of Jeffrey Dean Morgan and binge-streamed all summer due to Padelecki and Ackles. Great chemistry between the "brothers" who are real-life friends. It is also fun to see how the "boys" age in the 11 years the show has been on. After having trouble streaming on Netflix, I finally bought the DVD set. The DVD extras really added to my enjoyment. The writers, directors, and actors are all so committed. I am now perhaps the show's oldest fan :).
Excelent!!! The extras really complete the whole experience!
Fabulous story and having the first 10 seasons incased in a colorful holder is really nice. Shipment was faster than I expected and was totally pleased with the service!
Product was as described; brand new in shrink wrap; was well packaged and arrived quickly. very happy with order.
I love the show
I love the series.

Yeah.  What's to say.  Ten seasons of kick-ass awesome episodes, nice thick cardboard box, each season in an individual plastic case identical to what you get buying one at a time.  The corner of the box is smashed in a little, typical of how these dicks package such.  The mouth breathers in shipping just don't get it.  The box is part of the collection, not a shipping box.  It should have been packaged better, to prevent damage to the collection box.  But this happens all the time, I have given up on that battle, you can't win against an army of morons who stick stuff in packages for a living.  It's a great collection.
Got it on the 13th
Enjoyed all 10 Seasons

This Blu-ray Set Is Awesome And Region Free A Highly Recommend Buy If You Don't Own Any Supernatural Seasons On Blu-ray. An Each Season Is In It's Own Blu-ray Case And Has All The Special Features From The Normal Blu-ray Release Of Them.
Still watching it,it is very good and have enjoyed what I have seen.  I am still on season2.
Excellent Quality! And I love SN, have the 11th and 12th season as well cant wait for 13 to come out on blue- ray!!!

Bought this in feb 2017 and put it away for my son for Christmas, I was extremely happy until he started going through and there is damage to every single season case. So far season 7 case is the worse but thankfully the disks are fine. So minus the case damage beyond happy with my purchase.
Great product, very happy! All DVDs are in beautiful condition, as is the box. Would buy from this seller again! Thanks!
Purchased for my daughter for Christmas, so far so good.

5 stars for Supernatural, the show.  2 stars for glitchy Blue-Ray discs.  The Road Map special feature doesn't function properly, and freezes the Blue-Ray player, which can't even be turned off via the remote.  I have to unplug the player and restart the disc to re-navigate to the Road Map, to get maybe one or two little videos to play before it locks up again.  Season three discs never show the menu.  They are BD-ROMs (whatever that means). The disc automatically starts playing the episodes, from the beginning, but because there's no menu, you have to fast forward (or use the jump to next scene function) to get to another episode. Once you get to the special features section, you cannot navigate back to the episodes. You can, however, at least turn off the player via the remote, and start over again from the beginning.  On the plus side, you can watch all the episodes and features, albeit in an annoyingly roundabout fashion. I'm only on season 3.  Can't wait to see what sort of torturous route will be required in subsequent seasons.
